articles.author: MarketScreener
articles.title: MG Motor launches plug-in hybrid option in Mexico as EV race heats up
articles.description: (marketscreener.com) Carmaker MG Motor is launching a plug-in hybrid SUV in Mexico, the company announced on Thursday, as the market for hybrid and electric vehicles in the Latin American country heats up despite a lack of infrastructure and high costs for lo…
articles.content:
MG Motor's hybrid eHS model is set to hit Mexico's streets on Friday, alongside two combustion-engine models, the company said.
MG Motor, a formerly British brand now owned by China's SAIC Motor, op… [+1821 chars]
